{"id":717910409,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1 year, 7 months","timestamp":1654757154,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"7 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/717910409/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Longest Substring Without Repeating Characters","memory":"8.2 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int lengthOfLongestSubstring(string s) {\n        vector<int>mpp(256,-1);\n        int len=0;\n        int left=0,right=0;\n        int n =s.length();\n        while(right<n)\n        {\n            if(mpp[s[right]]!= -1)\n                left=max(left,mpp[s[right]]+1);\n            mpp[s[right]]=right;\n            len=max(len,right-left+1);\n            right++;\n        }\n        return len;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"longest-substring-without-repeating-characters","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
